website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Free Train Virtue proved to be a very comfortable and well-performing training shoe for many athletes. There were still several individual complaints about the discomfort caused by the collar of the trainer. However, very few durability issues were reported. Overall, the reviewers found the shoe to be an investment well worth making.
pros: A vast majority of reviewers gave high marks to the comfortable, sock-like fit of the Nike Free Train Virtue
Many training enthusiasts found the shoe to be perfect for exercising in the gym
The lightweight construction of the trainer received praise from a number of testers
The sock-like part of the upper supported the ankle very well, noted a consumer
Several purchasers considered the product to be well worth the money invested
cons: A user complained that a hole opened at the back of the shoe after less than two months of regular gym training
Another reviewer thought that the stretch collar of the shoe could be improved as it didn’t offer any ankle support
A disgruntled reviewer mentioned that he had a problem slipping the foot into the shoe

customer_reviews.title: He swears these are the best feeling/fitting shoes ever to wear when doing work outs
customer_reviews.text: He swears these are the best feeling/fitting shoes ever to wear when doing work outs. Absolutely loves them and will buy another pair when these wear out! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lint

customer_reviews.title: The best gym training shoes i’v ever had
customer_reviews.text: The first pair of Nike ordered on line because of Nike store in SF out of stock. It fits perfectly by ordering half size up. The best gym training shoes i’v ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Cross

customer_reviews.title: Only trainers that I've used over the past 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Only "hi-top" trainers that I can find as I have a real problem with heel slippage. Trainers work really well for any type of workout (lifting, running, plyo, cardio). Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe. But the top elastic is very tight and you have to get half size larger so you can slip your foot in it. But then the shoe will end up a bit too large
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus H Jallali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for heavy lifting and running
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are exactly what I was looking for! As others mentioned the elastic is a little tight but I opted for an extra size (10.5 when my size is 10) and they are perfect. Thanks to all those reviews which helped me in finding the right size. Very fast delivery. I would definetly recommend to my friends. These are just perfect for both running and heavy lifting like deadlifts and squats.
customer_reviews.author: Prem

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but...
customer_reviews.text: I love these, but they are hard to put on. I have another pair of trainers with this slip on style. This pair is so much more difficult to get on my feet. Otherwise, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Needs more cushion
customer_reviews.text: It could use more padding on the bottom but overall it looks cool, and is pretty durable. I thought it would provide some type of ankle support but doesn't. It's still a good shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: One Issue, But Still My Favorite Athletic Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about a year ago in Men's Size 11.5 (my size in almost every shoe model). I didn't notice at first, but my big toe pressed lightly against the front of the shoe which became bothersome over time. I love every other aspect of this shoe, so I gave in & bought another pair (half a size bigger). I am very pleased with my decision!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan L.

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They look amazing and feel like I could keep them on all day. I got them for the gym (weights training) and they do they job. No fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and stability
customer_reviews.text: I have a wider foot and I am big on comfort. These shoes are very comfortable and the fit is great for someone with a wider than average foot. Great for working out also.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I plan to use them casually as I have a ton of workout shoes. They look great with joggers and are extremely comfortable. I may use them to workout in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alito

customer_reviews.title: I was quite happy with ease of ordering and delivery
customer_reviews.text: I use this shoe because I have issues with my knee and the shoe is flexible and doesn't have much of an arch, which is good as that would put more pressure on the knee joint. I also feel supported by the higher top even though it isn't made to be really supportive, it is enough that my foot feels that it is stable .
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: The pattern is nice....But
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers are narrow near the heal, but flair out as they go to the front...like clown shoes..
customer_reviews.author: T La Roc

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: They feel ok. It kinda feels like the heel is too low. Not my favorite Nikes
customer_reviews.author: Hooahh

customer_reviews.title: Quality Crosstrain Show
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using them in CrossFit type workouts seem to fit and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Order 0.5us size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Should buy 0.5 size bigger. I wear 11 in other trainers and these were super tight for size 11.
customer_reviews.author: Amarveer Malhi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Son loved the way they looked- got them for football conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Garvin

customer_reviews.title: Favorite go to sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these shoes are discontinued. I personally like the fit. Good for training or slipping on to go run errands
customer_reviews.author: A. Lyell

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoes, they fit well. A little hard getting used to putting them on, due to the band at top. That's okay, that's what makes them cool!
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Needed something light weight for my workouts, got exactly what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lifting shoe
customer_reviews.text: For as expected and in my usual size. Great for lifting as well as running.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and great for working out in.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus D.

customer_reviews.title: Warrior Dash approved !!
customer_reviews.text: Just did a warrior dash in them ... thru the woods intense mud.. fun and the shoes were great for it! I use them for squating and other leg workouts!! Would buy them all over again!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn these to the gym ~4 days a week for the last 25 months and am still wearing them today! Only reason I’m on amazon (I bought from Nike - white) is that they have faded a little and I want a new pair!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: to hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: omg so hard to put on.. i workout to put this shoe on..lol also rubs the back of my foot.. looks beautiful but too much work to put on what the hell nike what were you thinking?
customer_reviews.author: John N.

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Free Train Virtue, Black/White-Dark Grey
product_meta.description: Men's Nike Free Train Virtue Training Shoe features an engineered upper and Flywire technology for locked-down support that can handle quick cuts. Its dual-density midsole provides the cushioning and responsiveness ideal for explosive movement.
feature_bullets: Flywire technology provides a locked-down fit.
Dual-density Phylon midsole for comfortable cushioning.
Tri-star flex grooves allow natural range of motion.
5/8-height collar creates a supportive fit and feel.
Rubber nodes on the outsole add traction for a more stable landing.
